title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Removing useless or idle objects is a wonderful way to free up energy and space around you. Youre inspired to perform a serious purge of unused items at home or at work today. However, be mindful that your zeal to clean and clear doesnt include throwing out things you might need or could fix up. Fortunately, Mars in meticulous Virgo is supercharged in your 4th House of Roots, helping you quickly discern which possessions you can salvage, toss in the trash, or pass on to an appreciative person. Author Marie Kondo wrote, The best way to find out what we really need is to get rid of what we dont. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
